page.title: 11Parks SUTTON SURREY
page.content: There are roughly 9O parks in the Sutton area. There are 2 gardeners for small parks and 4 in bigger parks. We use college and university students for extra help in the summer. We get some vandals. Mostly it is boisterous enthusiasm, but there are some malicious vandals that go into the parks at night and damage the buildings and flower beds. Not all parks have swings and slides, some are just open spaces with trees and grass. We grow a great many flowers, about 4O different types. Seven parks have cafes and the most popular park is Oaks Park. My favourite park is The Grove,Carshalton because of its ponds. The RSPCA use the ponds to rehabili- tate sick ducks prior to going out into the wild again.(Dave Brown,Parks and Training Co-ordinator, Sutton).
